html:
10.5.17  5:10 pm   Will you ever do a New Canaan type songwriting trip again?

     If so, any ideas about where to go?
10.5.17  5:04 pm   What are you and when?
10.5.17  4:52 pm   adopt me
10.5.17  4:11 pm   is this questions page your main source of communication with the outside world
10.5.17  3:24 pm   do people live at the far end of Long Island?
10.5.17  2:59 pm   Does Everything have a beginning, middle and end?
10.5.17  2:55 pm   5.10.15  11:50 pm Does this give you memories?

10.5.17  2:26 pm   5.10.15  11:50 pm did you ever check? where HAS the fun gone??



10.5.17  2:26 pm   5.10.15  11:50 pm did you ever check? where HAS the fun gone??

     

5.27.17  8:45 pm   I see the first question ever asked was on 5.10.15 11:50 pm, and the question was: "where has the fun gone" You replied: "i will check" Have you found it yet?

     

5.3.17  3:56 pm   Did you ever check where the fun has gone? If so, where is it? And will it ever come back?

     

3.10.17  9:32 pm   did you ever find out where the fun went?

     

8.17.16  6:49 pm   did you ever find out where the fun went?

     

     it is everywhere. all throughout the universe. it is our job to reach out and collect it
10.5.17  1:54 pm   If you actually make your answer to this question grammatically correct, I will make a tweet dedicated to you and all your glory.
10.5.17  1:06 pm   hug me, please. you're cute.
10.5.17  1:00 pm   Bill help ,my life is going to shit,what do I do
10.5.17  12:44 pm   why are some people mean?
10.5.17  12:44 pm   10.4.17  11:23 pm i meant it

10.5.17  12:19 pm   What do people mean when they refer to a "bright tone"? I usually hear it in reference to a guitar sound, like certain strings say 'bright' on the packaging, or maybe certain amp settings or something like that. Maybe it applies to other instruments too, not sure.
10.5.17  11:51 am   What are you doing to do if everyone you've agreed to date/marry on this page shows up on your doorstep at the same time?
10.5.17  11:47 am   do you ever regret making the questions page and/or view it as a necessary part of being a popular content creator but wish it didn't have to be that way?
10.5.17  11:42 am   do your times of isolation that you don't enjoy at the time eventually turn into sentimentality
10.5.17  10:58 am   make a song about me pls
10.5.17  10:52 am   Is Bill Wurtz an emo band?
10.5.17  10:24 am   How do we do things?
10.5.17  10:13 am   does any of these people who ask to date you actually contact you afterwards?
10.5.17  9:53 am   I really liked the 3D plane in outside and after all the 3D graphics in hotewig does this mean that 3D is becoming part of your video workflow?
10.5.17  6:39 am   10.4.17 6:31 am (not the op, btw) Seriously? How did you not know you had fangirls? Sincerely, a fangirl.
10.5.17  6:25 am   why did you discontinue the Monday series?
10.5.17  5:23 am   your new videos have some pretty interesting new visuals and stuff, but your music is kinda samey in every video, i think you should try to spice up your music.
10.5.17  2:37 am   why is it that i'm so awkward around everyone, even my family?
10.5.17  1:29 am   What is a smart thing to say?
10.5.17  12:44 am   What are some neat things you do?
10.4.17  11:52 pm   make a diss track,,,,, about grass
10.4.17  11:27 pm   If we found life on another planet, how would we learn to communicate with them?
10.4.17  11:26 pm   i think i might sample yours tho...

10.4.17  11:25 pm   have you ever thought about working with another person or a group of people to get longer videos done quicker,

     or do you take pride in the fact that everything is done by you?

      Also, do you, generally speaking, not like working in groups because you feel it detracts from your original artistic decisions?

      And finally, going off of that, how often do you change your mind/edit your ideas after starting a video (i.e. what is the creative process of making a video, short or long)
10.4.17  11:25 pm   Do you think that we will ever find the edge of the universe? If so, what would it look like?
10.4.17  11:23 pm   why do you agree to date everyone
10.4.17  10:40 pm   How do you come up with the catchphrases and jingles for your videos? They are actually 10/10 and really clever
10.4.17  10:32 pm   Do you even asked a question seriously?

10.4.17  9:58 pm   how do you feel about people using your art for didactic purposes, such as showing hotewig to a high school class or playing alphabet shuffle to a kindergarten class? does it demean your art to have it used in such a perfunctory matter?
10.4.17  9:43 pm   can i use your instrumentals for sampling?
10.4.17  9:37 pm   how long did it take to make your last video?
10.4.17  9:27 pm   are you embarrassed at how long it took for you to make hotewig?

10.4.17  9:19 pm   do your songs have a much greater deeper meaning

      or should we find the meaning for  ourselves ps: snakes or snakes
10.4.17  8:32 pm   Do you think everything has or should have a meaning?
10.4.17  8:10 pm   What should I do when someone asks for my credit card number over the phone?
10.4.17  7:56 pm   My grandparent's dog died while I was watching "The entire history of the world, I guess" for the first time.
10.4.17  7:43 pm   10.4.17  1:53 am Can we date?
10.4.17  6:54 pm   Do you have similar qualms about Patreon-exclusive content as you do with advertisements?
10.4.17  5:52 pm   what is the fuck
10.4.17  5:09 pm   do you think that miles davis lied about what he accomplished more than someone should?
10.4.17  4:58 pm   Do you think your next video will be more like a music video such as the last two? Or another one like the Steve video?

10.4.17  4:27 pm   I write things down on notepad and screenshot them so I can post them on instagram. I like doing this because it's one of those pieces of software that everyone is familiar with (for the most part) and it is pretty simple but I can write things that are really meaningful.
